ygData.subject: Lifetaps and Races
ygData.msgSnippet: Howdy all, Well after pondering this for quite a while (I really need to find more to do with my time), I ve come to agree with Bathory on the Lifetaps. I
ygData.messageBody:
Howdy all,

Well after pondering this for quite a while (I really need to find more to
do with my time), I've come to agree with Bathory on the Lifetaps. I didn't
use the spells they replaced and most likely I won't use them. But I'm sure
there going to be more useful to new SK's more so than the ones they
replace. So in this particular case I'll just sit back and let the change
happen since it really doesn't effect me or my SK. Now what I don't want is
to hear a week after it goes live that it sucks. You asked for them, and you
got them so live with it.

Now for the real question. I was talking to an acquaintance about this, Do
you all feel that the larger races make better SK's? From the impression I
received Verant feels that the larger races are that much better, where I
really don't see it. I personally play a DE and I can easily go toe to toe
with a Ogre or Troll (I've never lost a duel to an equal level SK yet), and
from observing other Sk's in combat I can do fairly equal damage (at the
higher lvls 35+) to my larger counterparts.

So what do you all think? Are larger races more powerful SK's? Both PVE and
PVP.

Enjoy..
